comment.author: 15362885@N00
comment._content: "cruise" is really not an appropriate tag for this ship. It provided scheduled passenger service, not modern vacation cruising.

comment.author: 73509022@N00
comment._content: Vistavision, your observation is correct, but I think there are many people who are not familiar with the distinction, to whom this would qualify as a cruise liner, and hopefully they will find that tag useful.
